FACILITIES.NAME: Name
FACILITIES.MOVE_TO_PRODUCTION_DESCRIPTION: You are trying to create a request for transferring the service into the production environment. Before the request can be evaluated, responsible authorities have to decide if the request is valid.
FACILITIES.MOVE_TO_PRODUCTION_DESCRIPTION_SPEC: Please choose specific persons/organizations form the list below. In case you leave the selection empty, the request will be evaluated by predefined list of authorities.
FACILITIES.MOVE_TO_PRODUCTION_EMAIL: I want to select responsible authorities
FACILITIES.EMAIL_DESCRIPTION: Fill in emails, for approving an email press button Enter
FACILITIES.DOCUMENT_SIGN_TITLE: Approve / reject request for transfer to production environment
FACILITIES.DOCUMENT_SIGN_SUCCESS: Your approval / rejection has been stored
FACILITIES.ARE_YOU_SURE_DELETE: Are you sure you want to delete service:
FACILITIES.ARE_YOU_SURE_REMOVE_ADMIN: You are going to remove the following admin:

FACILITIES.ADD_FACILITY_ADMINS_SUBMITTED: A notification has been sent to the specified emails
FACILITIES.ADD_ADMINS_DESCRIPTION: Fill in form below with emails of desired users
FACILITIES.ADD_ADMIN_SIGN_TITLE: Do you really want to become a manager of service

FACILITIES.ERROR_REQUEST_ALREADY_EXISTS: Request to change this service already exists
